entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.

entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning then north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
